text: Tower Hamlets Local Plan 287 COMMUNITY INFRASTRUCTURE BACK TO POLICIES 288 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES Policy CI2 Existing community facilities 1. Development proposals must retain existing community facilities unless it can be demonstrated that: a. there is no longer a need for the facility or any alternative community use within the local community; or b. a replacement facility of similar nature that would better meet the needs of existing users is provided. 2. Where community facilities are re-provided on site as part of the development proposal, the quality, inclusivity, and accessibility of these facilities (including public access) should be enhanced.
